subject: Re: [junit] junit and ant
msgSnippet: If you included your entire build code, there is nothing there that would compile  *Test.java to *Test.class George. ... From:  To:
messageBody:
If you included your entire build code, there is nothing there that would
compile *Test.java to *Test.class

George.


----- Original Message -----
From: <veena.g@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 31, 2002 2:05 AM
Subject: [junit] junit and ant


> ....
> and my build file
> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
> <project basedir="." default="run-junit" name="TdsTest">
> <property name="test" location="test"/>
> <target name="run-junit" description="junit-run" >
> <junit printsummary="true" haltonfailure="false">
> <formatter type="brief" usefile="true"/>
> <batchtest fork="true" todir="${test}">
> <fileset dir="${test}"
> includes="**/*Test.class"/>
> </batchtest>
> </junit>
> </target>
> </project>
>
